t2.Precision Shot: Increases ATK by 15% and ACC by 120.
t2.Eagle Eye: Increases all allies’ DEF Penetration by 60 and ACC by 60. If another ally has the same perk, only an additional 30 DEF Penetration and 30 ACC apply.
t2.Mortal Wound: On Critical Hit, reduces the enemy’s Recovery by 24% for 10 sec and deals Physical DoT equal to 20% of ATK every sec. Does not stack with the same effect from other allies.
t2.Opportune Strike: Increases Crit Chance by 185 and Crit DMG by 24%.
t2.Concentration: Every 5 sec, increases own Crit DMG by 3%. Stacks up to 24 times and cannot be removed.
